description:
Great entrepreneurs share an ability to see opportunities that others overlook. This course will arm you with set of practical tools to help you rapidly assess the potential of a new business idea. By being able to more quickly and accurately assess a business idea, you can sift through more ideas and have a better chance of seeing what others do not.
You will:
(1) Decide if and when would like to choose an entrepreneurial career.
(2) Use key tools and frameworks to rapidly assess the promise of a new business idea.
(3) Develop your strategic thinking skills.
(4) Be able to more effectively communicate a new business idea (e.g., to financial backers, customers, suppliers, or your boss) so that you maximize your chances of turning this idea into reality.
(5) Have fun!
title: Entrepreneurship and New Ventures
